reviews.review: A 10-year-anniversary movie indeed! It is not just a hurry-wrapping event to put an end to anything, but instead to tribute to what Marvel has been giving us for long, and to promise the vast of MCU will be explored  !

What a terrible ending. Full of jokes, because otherwise, you'd be too depressed to watch this thing for 2 1/2 hours.

The kind of fanboy who would give this movie five stars is the kind who would set fire to his action figures because he thought that was cool. Really, they should have called this film "Avengers: F*** You."

If I had an Infinity Gauntlet, I'd find a way to give this film zero stars.

I am both a fan of DC and Marvel but this was hands-down a freaking masterpiece. The first half of the movie was good but the last 30-40 minutes of the movie was soo perfect! The movie left me speechless at the end!

Only giving this two stars cause if I give this one star they won't count this review. That's really all I got to say. I don't want to get in depth what I hated about this movie cause I'd just be spoiling the movie and then there would be know point in watching this movie
Fantastic! Finally after all these years!!!!
Hero packed edge of your seat non stop action. Can't wait for the next installment of this great MCU.I could watch this over and over.

There is a definitely a lot going on in this movie; but Marvel did a great job in creating this colossal film.  There are so many characters involved in many plot points and yet my six year old son followed along, understood and enjoyed it too.  Definitely worth seeing on the silver screen.

all i'm going to say about this movie is you might want to bring a box of tissues and maybe some chocolate be prepared if you are easily emotional bring extra tissues i don't think i've ever watched a movie more emotionally traumatizing than this one thank you for coming to my ted talk

Was as funny as any Marvel movie but definitely not funnier. I choked up more during this than during any other Marvel movie. Higher stakes and loss equals more emotion. Tons of action. Cliffhanger at the end leaves you wondering what's next. Best villain of any Marvel movie, by far. I still feel like there were some missed opportunities, but the job the Russos did of juggling this many characters and keeping it this good is quite a feat.
Great fun. 2 1/2 hours flew by. So much action. Wasnâ€™t perfect but very few are. I will go see it again soon.
